Collaborative Music Lab Contact

The collaborative music lab focuses on creating shared musical experiences to the creation of new software and hardware instruments. In particular, we are interested in: - instrument design as creative process - musical knowledge and aesthetics embedded in musical instruments - how musical practice using music technology creates cultural impact - how people make electronic music together - future practices of making electronic music in ensemble

The CML is directed by [Ian Hattwick](https://ianhattwick.com)
